烰烰烰

烰字的基本解释

烰
fú
热气上升。

烰
páo
古通“庖”：“其君令烰人养之。”

烰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》縛謀切，平尤，奉。］
热气蒸腾。参见“烰烰”。
[②]［fū］
见“烰2炭”。

烰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　烰； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页671第12
【唐韻】縛牟切【集韻】【韻會】房尤切【正韻】房鳩切，?音浮。【爾雅·釋訓】烰烰，烝也。【註】氣出盛。【疏】大雅云：烝之浮浮。浮烰音義同。　又【呂氏春秋】有侁氏女子採桑，得嬰兒于空桑之中，獻之其君，其君令烰人養之。【註】烰，猶庖也。　又【集韻】平幽切，音滮。火氣也。

烰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
烰字的起名意思

暂无。

烰
Basic explanation of words
烰
fú
Heat rises.
烰
páo
Gu Tong "庖": "The monarch ordered the people to raise it."
烰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" Bin Mouqie, Pingyou, Feng. ]
The steam evaporates. See "Yangyan".
[②]［fū］
See "Yuan 2 Char".
烰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　烰; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 671-12
[Tang Yun] Bin Muqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fang Youqie [Zheng Yun] Fang Jiuqie, sound floating. 【Erya·Shixun】Yuanyan, Suiya. [Note] Out of breath. [Sparse] Daya Cloud: Sui's Floating. Floating has the same meaning.　[Lü's Spring and Autumn] There is a woman from the Yun family who picks mulberries, and gets the baby among the empty mulberries, offering her to her monarch, and her monarch to order the people to raise it. 【Note】Yuan, it's still alive.　[Jiyun] Ping and quietly, with sound. Huoqi also.
烰

гл. готовить пищу; варить на пару; стряпать
